title: Dyns DNS system
extract: The Domain Name System (DNS) is a distributed directory that resolves human-readable hostnames, such as www.dyn.com, into machine-readable IP addresses like 50.16.85.103. ... Intelligent DNS services can manipulate DNS responses, deciding which IP(s) are returned to ensure the best performance and reliability for clients.Aug 9, 2018
extract_html: The Domain Name System (DNS) is a distributed directory that resolves human-readable hostnames, such as www.dyn.com, into machine-readable IP addresses like 50.16.85.103. ...
